definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The modern superficies systems stem from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 近現代地上權肇端於羅馬法。

sentences.english: The counter-claim system comes from the ancient Roman law.
sentences.chinese: 反訴制度肇始於古代羅馬法。

sentences.english: The concept of proprietorship in modern sense originated from the Roman law.
sentences.chinese: 現代意義上的所有權概念起源於羅馬法。

sentences.english: The system of infants?capacity of parties originates from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 未成年人締約能力制度可以追溯到羅馬法。

sentences.english: Strict liability derives from Roman law as the contract responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格責任最初作爲契約法上的責任源於羅馬法。

sentences.english: It has been existed since the Roman Law times.
sentences.chinese: 用益權在羅馬法時期就已經存在。

sentences.english: As an institution of debt preservation, subrogation originated from ancient Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 債權保全制度起源於羅馬法上的撤銷之訴。

sentences.english: Paternity system that originated from Roman law and Germanic law has walked into the world.
sentences.chinese: 源於羅馬法和日爾曼法的親權制度已走向世界。

sentences.english: Roman law has had little influence on the development of English law.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬法對於英國法的發展影響甚少。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
